IN_STORE_RETURN.locations: Not applicable, as there are no physical retail stores for returns. Returns are sent to the seller's registered office.
IN_STORE_RETURN.time_limit: 14 days from withdrawal notification, which must be sent within 14 days of goods receipt.
IN_STORE_RETURN.conditions: Goods must be returned within 14 days of withdrawal notification. Perishable goods, goods removed from sealed hygienic packaging, alcoholic beverages (under certain conditions), newspapers, periodicals, and digital content (if not on tangible medium and with prior consent) cannot be returned. Consumer bears the cost of return shipping.

DROP_OFF_PARCEL_SHOP.cost: Consumer bears the cost of return shipping.

DROP_OFF_PARCEL_LOCKER.cost: Consumer bears the cost of return shipping.

FREE_RETURN.conditions: Consumer bears all costs associated with returning the goods.

EXTERNAL_RETURN_PORTAL.features: The entire process is fully in your hands and under your control. You choose what you want to complain about, saving valuable time. Compensation in the form of credits is immediately uploaded to your customer account. Credits are a matter of course. If you do not want compensation credits, you can do a good deed and donate them to the Šatník foundation, which helps Ukrainian mothers with children. You will brighten eyes and gladden the hearts of those who truly need it. Thank you!

SUMMARY: Rohlik.cz offers an online complaint/return process via their website or application. Customers have 72 hours (3 days) from the delivery of the order to initiate an online complaint. The process is self-service, allowing customers to select items for complaint. Compensation is provided in the form of credits, which are immediately added to the customer's account. There is also an option to donate these credits to the Šatník foundation, which supports Ukrainian mothers with children. No information is provided regarding in-store returns, home collection, parcel locker/shop drop-offs, or the use of QR codes/barcodes/PINs for returns.
